name: get_boards
description: A list of all boards and their attributes.

page.description: Get the items on a specific page. 0(default) is the first page.

page_size.description: Get the number of boards on a specific page. Default: 5.

name: get_threads
description: A summarized list of all threads on a board including thread numbers, their modification time and reply count.

board.description: The board on which the threads are. This can be found in boards.json.

page.description: Index pages start at 1(default). The maximum number of pages (can be found in boards.json) may vary depending on the board.

name: get_catalog
description: A JSON representation of a board catalog. Includes all OPs and their preview replies.

board.description: Get the calalog of the specific board. This can be found in boards.json.

page.description: Index pages start at 1(default). The maximum number of pages (can be found in boards.json) may vary depending on the board.

limit.description: Number of threads to return per call. Default: 3.

offset.description: Number of threads to skip in the page. Default: 0.

name: get_archive
description: A list of all closed threads in a board archive. Archived threads no longer receive posts.

board.description: The board in whose archive the threads are. This can be found in boards.json.

name: get_threads_with_preview
description: A list of threads and their preview replies from a specified index page.

board.description: The board on which the threads are. This can be found in boards.json.

page.description: Index pages start at 1(default). The maximum number of pages (can be found in boards.json) may vary depending on the board.

limit.description: Number of threads to return per call. Default: 3.

offset.description: Number of threads to skip in the page. Default: 0.

name: get_posts
description: A full list of posts in a single thread.

board.description: The board on which the threads are. This can be found in boards.json.

thread_no.description: Get the posts in a specific thread OP number. This can be found in threads.json or <board>/<page>.json.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
